mapper.update: update rgct_method set module = #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interface_name = #{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param = #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_desc = #{methodDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_check_status = #{isCheckStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_check_del = #{isCheckDel,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_back_hist = #{isBackHist,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, module, interface_name, method_name, param, method_desc, is_check_status, is_check_del, is_back_hist from rgct_method where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, module, interface_name, method_name, param, method_desc, is_check_status, is_check_del, is_back_hist from rgct_method
